Package com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MutableSelection
    Represents an image selection that can be changed programmatically.
    TransformableSelection
    Defines a series of "static" transforms that can be applied to a selection.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBoundsTool
    Mouse and keyboard event handler for tools that define a bounding box by clicking and dragging the mouse from the top-left point of the bounds to the bottom-right point.
    AbstractLineTool
    Mouse and keyboard handler for tools defining a line drawn between two points.
    AbstractPathTool
    Mouse and keyboard handler for tools that define a free-form path on the canvas by clicking and dragging.
    AbstractPolylineTool
    Mouse and keyboard handler for tools that define multiple segments/points along a path.
    AbstractSelectionTool
    Mouse and keyboard handler for drawing selections (free-form or bounded) on the canvas.
    AbstractTransformTool
    Mouse and keyboard handler for tools that define a bounding box with flexible corners that can be dragged into a desired position and shape.
    PaintTool
    A base tool class holding common attribute providers (like stroke, fill and font), plus empty, template methods for keyboard and mouse events.
